name: example-blockchain
description: included packages commands: npm init -y npm install nodemon --save-dev npm install crypto-js --save npm install jest --save-dev npm install express --save npm install body-parser --save npm install ws --save npm install elliptic --save

scripts.install: npm init -y && npm install nodemon --save-dev && npm install crypto-js --save && npm install jest --save-dev && npm install express --save && npm install body-parser --save && npm install ws --save && npm install elliptic --save && npm install uuid --save && npm install multer --save
scripts.uninstall: npm uninstall multer && npm uninstall uuid && npm uninstall elliptic && npm uninstall ws && npm uninstall body-parser && npm uninstall express && npm uninstall jest && npm uninstall crypto-js && npm uninstall nodemon
